description: This file defines WebSocket route handlers for live ride tracking in a ride-sharing backend, including driver, rider, and admin endpoints. It sets up routes with respective WebSocket handlers that start real-time sessions for each role.

methods.name: None ws_ride_driver(websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles WebSocket connections for driver location updates during an active ride.

methods.name: None ws_ride_rider(websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles WebSocket connections for riders to subscribe to ride status and driver location updates.

methods.name: None ws_ride_admin(websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles WebSocket connections for admin or driver monitoring, currently a placeholder for future features.

ctags.name: ws_ride_admin
ctags.pattern: /^async def ws_ride_admin(websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> N/
ctags.signature: (websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: ws_ride_driver
ctags.pattern: /^async def ws_ride_driver(websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> /
ctags.signature: (websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.pattern: /^async def ws_ride_rider(websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> N/
ctags.signature: (websocket: WebSocket, ride_id: UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
